scene_description_enriched: A procession is depicted, with several men carrying a golden, ornate shrine or reliquary on their shoulders, draped with a richly patterned red cloth. The men are dressed in elaborate, colorful robes and turbans. They are moving towards an arched doorway or entrance, which is part of a larger architectural structure. The background on the left is a deep blue with a swirling pattern, possibly representing fabric or a decorative wall. The architecture features arches and columns, suggesting a religious or ceremonial building. The scene likely depicts a religious procession, possibly the transport of a sacred relic or an important religious artifact.
